member.name: T:SitefinityWebApp.AzureWebRole
member.summary: Sitefinity's Windows Azure role entry point.
member.remarks: Windows Azure looks for RoleEntryPoint inheritors only in the web role assembly and that is why this class is defined here. The functionality goes into the base class - .
